KnowledgeBase.Title: upcase
KnowledgeBase.ArgumentTypes: String Text Character String Text Character

Function.Description: The upcase function converts lowercase characters to uppercase characters.

Brief.Overview-String: The upcase function converts lowercase Character or String into uppercase Characters or String.
Brief.Overview-Symbol: The upcase function converts converts all lowercase characters in the input Symbol into uppercase characters.
Brief.Usage: Use the upcase function to convert lowercase characters to uppercase characters.

Argument.Name: string
Argument.Note: Any String or Text or Character to be converted to uppercase.

Syntax-String.Return: A new Character, Text or String with all the lowercase characters in the original argument converted to uppercase.

Syntax-Symbol.Return: A new Symbol with all lowercase characters in the original symbol converted to uppercase.
